Here is the list of signs at $line, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Feisty and impulsive, but also prone to mood swings.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and materialistic.

4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotionally sensitive and nurturing, but can be moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and passionate, but may come across as arrogant or self-centered.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, but may prioritize appearances over authenticity.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, but may struggle with trust issues and jealousy.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be reckless and blunt.

11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but may struggle with emotional expression.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but can be dreamy and easily distracted.
